file_content.text: It was foolish of you to return here.
Uh-oh. Looks like we got another fight on our hands.
Those pieces you took from my minions belong to me! They will enable me to exact my revenge on Lord Pharshol.
I am Lord Vacuus. The conqueror of Begeren. The killer of Garatak the Singed. Return what you have stolen or burn!
Die at the hands of Vacuus!
Stand in my way and you are defying Lord Baras.
I've never heard of a "Lord Baras." If you're name dropping, you're doing a pitiful job of it.
This is tiresome. You had your chance. Now die.
You don't look like a Sith to me.
Perhaps your vision will improve in death!
